product_overview: DancerPro is a comprehensive mobile and web application designed for entertainment professionals to efficiently manage work shifts, clients, venues, outfits, and finances. Featuring secure authentication, real-time communication, cloud synchronization, and advanced analytics, it empowers users with actionable insights and seamless data management across devices.
core_goals: Provide a robust and secure authentication system supporting login, signup, password management, and WebAuthn.
Enable efficient management and tracking of work shifts, clients, venues, outfits, and earnings.
Offer comprehensive financial management and analytics for income and expense optimization.
Facilitate real-time communication and collaboration via WebSocket.
Ensure seamless cloud synchronization with offline capabilities and conflict resolution.
Deliver an intuitive dashboard summarizing key metrics and performance analytics.
Maintain strong user security settings including password and privacy controls.
Support scalable deployment with smooth performance across platforms.
key_features: Complete Authentication System with JWT, password reset, and WebAuthn support.
Dashboard Analytics with real-time KPIs, earnings, client, venue and outfit insights.
Client Management for tracking, relationships, earnings, and performance metrics.
Shift Management including scheduling, tracking, duration, and historical data.
Financial Management for money tracking, expenses, transaction filtering, and export.
Outfit Management with expense tracking, ROI analysis, and performance recommendations.
Venue Management with location-based insights and relationship tracking.
Security Settings for user preferences, password, and enhanced authentication.
Cloud Synchronization for backup, cross-device consistency, offline data support, and conflict handling.
Real-time Communication via WebSocket with messaging, notifications, and collaboration features.
AI Insights and Advanced Analytics dashboards for business intelligence (future enhancements).
user_flow_summary: User signs up or logs in with email/password; credentials validated and JWT tokens issued; password reset available for recovery.
After login, user lands on the Dashboard showing key analytics and recent activity with real-time updates.
User manages clients, shifts, outfits, venues; adds and edits records; tracks financial transactions and expenses.
Changes propagate instantly via WebSocket; cross-device sync ensures consistency; notifications inform users.
User accesses Security Settings to update preferences, password, and configure WebAuthn for enhanced security.
Data changes synchronize automatically to cloud; backups preserve data; offline use supported with conflict resolution.
User securely logs out; session ends and tokens invalidated; data remains synchronized.
validation_criteria: Successful completion of authentication flows: signup, login, password reset, and WebAuthn.
Fully functional CRUD operations across all data management modules.
Dashboard updates accurately and in real-time with correct analytics.
Real-time communication transmits messages reliably and promptly.
Cloud synchronization maintains data integrity across devices and recovers from conflicts.
User security preferences and settings persist and apply correctly.
UI components render and behave consistently across supported devices and platforms.
Backend APIs respond efficiently within defined performance thresholds.
Real-time updates exhibit minimal latency and high reliability.
Database operations are optimized for responsiveness and scalability.
Deployment pipelines produce stable, production-ready builds.
Application maintains smooth runtime behavior under expected user load.
System architecture supports horizontal scalability and monitoring for performance and errors.
